member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.NONE
member.summary: Normal operation

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.LEGACY_DWORD
member.summary: Assume pitch is DWORD aligned instead of BYTE aligned

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.PARAGRAPH
member.summary: Assume pitch is 16-byte aligned instead of BYTE aligned

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.YMM
member.summary: Assume pitch is 32-byte aligned instead of BYTE aligned

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.ZMM
member.summary: The ZMM

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.PAGE4K
member.summary: Assume pitch is 4096-byte aligned instead of BYTE aligned

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.BAD_DXTN_TAILS
member.summary: BC formats with malformed mipchain blocks smaller than 4x4

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.BPP24
member.summary: Override with a legacy 24 bits-per-pixel format size

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.BPP16
member.summary: Override with a legacy 16 bits-per-pixel format size

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS.BPP8
member.summary: Override with a legacy 8 bits-per-pixel format size

member.name: T:DirectXTexNet.TEX_MISC_FLAG
member.summary: Subset here matches D3D10_RESOURCE_MISC_FLAG and D3D11_RESOURCE_MISC_FLAG

member.name: T:DirectXTexNet.TEX_ALPHA_MODE
member.summary: Matches DDS_ALPHA_MODE, encoded in MISC_FLAGS2

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.LEGACY_DWORD
member.summary: Assume pitch is DWORD aligned instead of BYTE aligned (used by some legacy DDS files)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.NO_LEGACY_EXPANSION
member.summary: Do not implicitly convert legacy formats that result in larger pixel sizes (24 bpp, 3:3:2, A8L8, A4L4, P8, A8P8)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.NO_R10B10G10A2_FIXUP
member.summary: Do not use work-around for long-standing D3DX DDS file format issue which reversed the 10:10:10:2 color order masks

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.FORCE_RGB
member.summary: Convert DXGI 1.1 BGR formats to DXGI_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM to avoid use of optional WDDM 1.1 formats

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.NO_16BPP
member.summary: Conversions avoid use of 565, 5551, and 4444 formats and instead expand to 8888 to avoid use of optional WDDM 1.2 formats

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.EXPAND_LUMINANCE
member.summary: When loading legacy luminance formats expand replicating the color channels rather than leaving them packed (L8, L16, A8L8)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.BAD_DXTN_TAILS
member.summary: Some older DXTn DDS files incorrectly handle mipchain tails for blocks smaller than 4x4

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.FORCE_DX10_EXT
member.summary: Always use the 'DX10' header extension for DDS writer (i.e. don't try to write DX9 compatible DDS files)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.DDS_FLAGS.FORCE_DX10_EXT_MISC2
member.summary: FORCE_DX10_EXT including miscFlags2 information (result may not be compatible with D3DX10 or D3DX11)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.FORCE_RGB
member.summary: Loads DXGI 1.1 BGR formats as DXGI_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM to avoid use of optional WDDM 1.1 formats

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.NO_X2_BIAS
member.summary: Loads DXGI 1.1 X2 10:10:10:2 format as DXGI_FORMAT_R10G10B10A2_UNORM

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.NO_16BPP
member.summary: Loads 565, 5551, and 4444 formats as 8888 to avoid use of optional WDDM 1.2 formats

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.ALLOW_MONO
member.summary: Loads 1-bit monochrome (black and white) as R1_UNORM rather than 8-bit grayscale

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.ALL_FRAMES
member.summary: Loads all images in a multi-frame file, converting/resizing to match the first frame as needed, defaults to 0th frame otherwise

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.IGNORE_SRGB
member.summary: Ignores sRGB metadata if present in the file

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.DITHER
member.summary: Use ordered 4x4 dithering for any required conversions

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.DITHER_DIFFUSION
member.summary: Use error-diffusion dithering for any required conversions

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.FILTER_POINT
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing (only needed when loading arrays of differently sized images; defaults to Fant)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.FILTER_LINEAR
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing (only needed when loading arrays of differently sized images; defaults to Fant)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.FILTER_CUBIC
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing (only needed when loading arrays of differently sized images; defaults to Fant)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.WIC_FLAGS.FILTER_FANT
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing (only needed when loading arrays of differently sized images; defaults to Fant) Combination of Linear and Box filter

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.WRAP_U
member.summary: Wrap vs. Mirror vs. Clamp filtering options

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.WRAP_V
member.summary: Wrap vs. Mirror vs. Clamp filtering options

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.WRAP_W
member.summary: Wrap vs. Mirror vs. Clamp filtering options

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.WRAP
member.summary: Wrap vs. Mirror vs. Clamp filtering options

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.MIRROR_V
member.summary: Wrap vs. Mirror vs. Clamp filtering options

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.MIRROR_W
member.summary: Wrap vs. Mirror vs. Clamp filtering options

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.MIRROR
member.summary: Wrap vs. Mirror vs. Clamp filtering options

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.SEPARATE_ALPHA
member.summary: Resize color and alpha channel independently

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.FLOAT_X2BIAS
member.summary: Enable *2 - 1 conversion cases for unorm to/from float and positive-only float formats

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.RGB_COPY_RED
member.summary: When converting RGB to R, defaults to using grayscale. These flags indicate copying a specific channel instead When converting RGB to RG, defaults to copying RED | GREEN. These flags control which channels are selected instead.

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.RGB_COPY_GREEN
member.summary: When converting RGB to R, defaults to using grayscale. These flags indicate copying a specific channel instead When converting RGB to RG, defaults to copying RED | GREEN. These flags control which channels are selected instead.

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.RGB_COPY_BLUE
member.summary: When converting RGB to R, defaults to using grayscale. These flags indicate copying a specific channel instead When converting RGB to RG, defaults to copying RED | GREEN. These flags control which channels are selected instead.

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.DITHER
member.summary: Use ordered 4x4 dithering for any required conversions

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.DITHER_DIFFUSION
member.summary: Use error-diffusion dithering for any required conversions

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.POINT
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.LINEAR
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.CUBIC
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.BOX
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.FANT
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing Equiv to Box filtering for mipmap generation

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.TRIANGLE
member.summary: Filtering mode to use for any required image resizing

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.SRGB
member.summary: sRGB to/from RGB for use in conversion operations if the input format type is IsSRGB(), then SRGB_IN is on by default if the output format type is IsSRGB(), then SRGB_OUT is on by default

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.FORCE_NON_WIC
member.summary: Forces use of the non-WIC path when both are an option

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS.FORCE_WIC
member.summary: Forces use of the WIC path even when logic would have picked a non-WIC path when both are an option

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_PMALPHA_FLAGS.IGNORE_SRGB
member.summary: ignores sRGB colorspace conversions

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_PMALPHA_FLAGS.REVERSE
member.summary: converts from premultiplied alpha back to straight alpha

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_PMALPHA_FLAGS.SRGB
member.summary: if the input format type is IsSRGB(), then SRGB_IN is on by default if the output format type is IsSRGB(), then SRGB_OUT is on by default

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS.RGB_DITHER
member.summary: Enables dithering RGB colors for BC1-3 compression

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS.A_DITHER
member.summary: Enables dithering alpha for BC1-3 compression

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS.DITHER
member.summary: Enables both RGB and alpha dithering for BC1-3 compression

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS.UNIFORM
member.summary: Uniform color weighting for BC1-3 compression; by default uses perceptual weighting

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS.BC7_USE_3SUBSETS
member.summary: Enables exhaustive search for BC7 compress for mode 0 and 2; by default skips trying these modes

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS.BC7_QUICK
member.summary: Minimal modes (usually mode 6) for BC7 compression

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS.SRGB
member.summary: if the input format type is IsSRGB(), then SRGB_IN is on by default if the output format type is IsSRGB(), then SRGB_OUT is on by default

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS.PARALLEL
member.summary: Compress is free to use multithreading to improve performance (by default it does not use multithreading)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.CHANNEL_RED
member.summary: Channel selection when evaluting color value for height

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.CHANNEL_GREEN
member.summary: Channel selection when evaluting color value for height

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.CHANNEL_BLUE
member.summary: Channel selection when evaluting color value for height

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.CHANNEL_ALPHA
member.summary: Channel selection when evaluting color value for height

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.CHANNEL_LUMINANCE
member.summary: Channel selection when evaluting color value for height Luminance is a combination of red, green, and blue

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.MIRROR_U
member.summary: Use mirror semantics for scanline references (defaults to wrap)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.MIRROR_V
member.summary: Use mirror semantics for scanline references (defaults to wrap)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.MIRROR
member.summary: Use mirror semantics for scanline references (defaults to wrap)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.INVERT_SIGN
member.summary: Inverts normal sign

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CNMAP_FLAGS.COMPUTE_OCCLUSION
member.summary: Computes a crude occlusion term stored in the alpha channel

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CMSE_FLAGS.IMAGE1_SRGB
member.summary: Indicates that image needs gamma correction before comparision

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CMSE_FLAGS.IMAGE2_SRGB
member.summary: Indicates that image needs gamma correction before comparision

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CMSE_FLAGS.IGNORE_RED
member.summary: Ignore the channel when computing MSE

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CMSE_FLAGS.IGNORE_GREEN
member.summary: Ignore the channel when computing MSE

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CMSE_FLAGS.IGNORE_BLUE
member.summary: Ignore the channel when computing MSE

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CMSE_FLAGS.IGNORE_ALPHA
member.summary: Ignore the channel when computing MSE

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CMSE_FLAGS.IMAGE1_X2_BIAS
member.summary: Indicates that image should be scaled and biased before comparison (i.e. UNORM -> SNORM)

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.CMSE_FLAGS.IMAGE2_X2_BIAS
member.summary: Indicates that image should be scaled and biased before comparison (i.e. UNORM -> SNORM)

member.name: T:DirectXTexNet.EvaluatePixelsDelegate
member.summary: The delegate used for the EvaluateImage method.
member.param: The pixels. This a row of Pixels with each pixel normally represented as RBGA in 4x32bit float (0.0-1.0).

member.name: T:DirectXTexNet.TransformPixelsDelegate
member.summary: The delegate used for the EvaluateImage method.
member.param: The out pixels to write to. This a row of Pixels with each pixel normally represented as RBGA in 4x32bit float (0.0-1.0).
The input pixels. This a row of Pixels with each pixel normally represented as RBGA in 4x32bit float (0.0-1.0).

member.name: T:DirectXTexNet.Image
member.summary: This is an immutable class representing the native Image struct. It also keeps a reference to a parent to prevent finalizing of the parent when the image is still used. But it's still strongly encouraged to manually dispose ScratchImages.

member.name: T:DirectXTexNet.TexMetadata
member.summary: This class represents the native TexMetadata struct. A managed class is used to simplify passing it by reference.

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TexMetadata.Height
member.summary: The height. Should be 1 for 1D textures.

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TexMetadata.Depth
member.summary: The depth. Should be 1 for 1D or 2D textures.

member.name: F:DirectXTexNet.TexMetadata.ArraySize
member.summary: The array size. For cubemap, this is a multiple of 6.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.ComputeImageIndex(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Computes the image index for the specified values. If the image index is out of range is returned.
member.returns: The image index. If the image index is out of range is returned.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.OwnsData
member.summary: Whether this ScratchImage owns the pixel data;

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.GetPixels
member.summary: Normally GetImage().pixels should be used instead, because this only returns a pointer to the pixel data if this image owns the pixel data.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.GetPixelsSize
member.summary: This only returns a value if this image owns the pixel data.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.IsAlphaAllOpaque
member.summary: Determines whether all pixels are opaque. This method is not supported by temporary scratch images.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.CreateImageCopy(System.Int32,System.Boolean,DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS)
member.summary: Creates a new ScratchImage (deep copy).
member.param: Index of the image to make a copy of.
if set to true and the height of the image is 1 a 1D Texture is created instead a 2D Texture.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.CreateArrayCopy(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS)
member.summary: Creates a new Array ScratchImage (deep copy).
member.param: if set to true and the height of the image is 1 a 1D Texture is created instead a 2D Texture.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.CreateCopyWithEmptyMipMaps(System.Int32,DirectXTexNet.DXGI_FORMAT,DirectXTexNet.CP_FLAGS,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a copy of the image but with empty mip maps (not part of original DirectXTex). Can be used to generate the mip maps by other means (DirectXTex MipMap Generation is pretty slow).
member.param: if set to true the mip map levels are zeroed out.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.Resize(System.Int32,System.Int32,DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS)
member.summary: Resize the image to width x height. Defaults to Fant filtering. Note for a complex resize, the result will always have mipLevels == 1.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.ConvertToSinglePlane(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts the image from a planar format to an equivalent non-planar format.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.ConvertToSinglePlane
member.summary: Converts the image from a planar format to an equivalent non-planar format.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.GenerateMipMaps(System.Int32,DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates the mip maps.
member.param: The filter. Defaults to Fant filtering which is equivalent to a box filter.
Levels of '0' indicates a full mipchain, otherwise is generates that number of total levels (including the source base image).
if set to true and the height of the image is 1 a 1D Texture is created instead a 2D Texture.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.GenerateMipMaps(DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates the mip maps.
member.param: The filter. Defaults to Fant filtering which is equivalent to a box filter.
Levels of '0' indicates a full mipchain, otherwise is generates that number of total levels (including the source base image).

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.GenerateMipMaps3D(System.Int32,System.Int32,DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates the mip maps.
member.param: The filter. Defaults to Fant filtering which is equivalent to a box filter.
Levels of '0' indicates a full mipchain, otherwise is generates that number of total levels (including the source base image).

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.GenerateMipMaps3D(DirectXTexNet.TEX_FILTER_FLAGS,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates the mip maps.
member.param: The filter. Defaults to Fant filtering which is equivalent to a box filter.
Levels of '0' indicates a full mipchain, otherwise is generates that number of total levels (including the source base image).

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.PremultiplyAlpha(System.Int32,DirectXTexNet.TEX_PMALPHA_FLAGS)
member.summary: Converts to/from a premultiplied alpha version of the texture.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.PremultiplyAlpha(DirectXTexNet.TEX_PMALPHA_FLAGS)
member.summary: Converts to/from a premultiplied alpha version of the texture.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.Compress(System.Int32,DirectXTexNet.DXGI_FORMAT,DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS,System.Single)
member.summary: Compresses the specified source image. Note that threshold is only used by BC1.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.Compress(System.Int32,System.IntPtr,DirectXTexNet.DXGI_FORMAT,DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS,System.Single)
member.summary: DirectCompute-based compression
member.param: The alpha weight (is only used by BC7. 1.0 is the typical value to use).

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.Compress(DirectXTexNet.DXGI_FORMAT,DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS,System.Single)
member.summary: Compresses the specified source image. Note that threshold is only used by BC1.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.ScratchImage.Compress(System.IntPtr,DirectXTexNet.DXGI_FORMAT,DirectXTexNet.TEX_COMPRESS_FLAGS,System.Single)
member.summary: DirectCompute-based compression
member.param: The alpha weight (is only used by BC7. 1.0 is the typical value to use).

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.TexHelper.ComputeImageIndex(DirectXTexNet.TexMetadata,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Computes the image index for the specified values. If the image index is out of range is returned. The ScratchImage provide a ComputeImageIndex method as well, which should be used preferrably.
member.returns: The image index. If the image index is out of range is returned.

member.name: M:DirectXTexNet.TexHelper.InitializeTemporary(DirectXTexNet.Image[],DirectXTexNet.TexMetadata,System.IDisposable[])
member.summary: Creates a temporary image collection (Not part of the original DirectXTex). This does not copy the data. Be sure to not dispose the original ScratchImages that were combined in this collection. Alternatively the ownership of the original ScratchImage(s) can be passed to this instance.
member.param: Optional objects this instance should take ownership of.
